Package tk.borroot.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.borroot.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerHuman, PlayerMenace, PlayerMinimax, PlayerNegamax, PlayerQlearning, PlayerRandom
    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a player with a symbol. All other players implement this class and the move function.
    Author:
    Bram Pulles

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public abstract int move​(Board board)
                  throws MoveException,
                         DiedException
        This function will be asked to players when they can make a move.
        Parameters:
        board - to be made a move on
        Returns:
        a value in [0..8] which corresponds to the move
        Throws:
        MoveException - if the player cannot make a move anymore
        DiedException - if the player died

      • learn

        public abstract void learn​(Player winner)
        This function will be called at the end of each game. This function should activate the learning mechanism of the reinforcement learning algorithms.
        Parameters:
        winner - who won the last game (with this board)

      • setSymbol

        public void setSymbol​(Symbol symbol)
        Set the symbol of this player.
        Parameters:
        symbol - new symbol

      • getSymbol

        public Symbol getSymbol()
        Get the symbol of this player.
        Returns:
        players symbol
